reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress gorgeous and perfect for formal occasions, with a stretchy material that fits well without being tight. The dress is comfortable, not itchy, and can be customized in length, making it suitable for tall women. They appreciate its flattering design that shows off curves and comes in multiple color choices. While some it's not too sheer, others find it very see-through. My daughter wore it to homecoming and she felt so confident wearing it. The dress fit perfectly and she said it was comfortable." Read more "This was comfortable, beautiful , and not too hot. I got the smallest size in a burgundy/red color and it came looking exactly how the picture did." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for homecoming dress
items.body: Ordered for my daughter for her homecoming dress. Fit true to size. Just as pictured. It was modest enough for her to feel comfortable at dancing and moving at the dance and looked great! Good quality. The sleeves are sheer but the rest of the dress is thicker and not see through. Read more
items.author: Horraxe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh, just BUY it already!
items.body: This MASCOMODA mini dress is a winner! From the moment I slipped it on, I was impressed by the fantastic fit – it truly felt like it was tailored just for me. The material quality definitely exceeded my expectations; it feels substantial and well-made. The weight of the fabric is also spot-on, providing a comfortable feel that isn't too heavy or too light, making it perfect for various occasions. Plus, the fabric is wonderfully soft against the skin. And the best part? I received so many compliments while wearing it! The elegant square neck and chic lantern long sleeves, combined with the flattering ruched bodycon design, create a truly stunning silhouette. If you're looking for a dress that fits beautifully, boasts excellent material, and turns heads, this dress is a fantastic choice. Read more
items.author: DD Maloney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter approved, pretty and comfortable
items.body: Purchased a small for my 12 yr old daughter (5'2" 105#) and she loves it. The color is accurate to picture, seams are clean, nit see through. Length and fit are on point and age appropriate. This dress can easily be dressed up or down. This purchase exceeded our expectations. Would recommend. Read more
items.author: CTMOM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sent the wrong color otherwise Great product!
items.body: The dress looked and fit amazing on my daughter for her homecoming not to short or too long she is 5'1. I would definitely order again the ONLY reason I didn't give it 5 starts is because we ordered the Kelly green and they sent the black but it ended up being no big deal but I did want to point that out Incase you are in time time crunch and can't send it back we had time but didn't want to do it so it worked out overall great find and the price was really good as well. Read more
items.author: Ashley K.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and price
items.body: This dress was just what I was looking for. It is classy and sexy at the same time. I found myself needing a dress last minute for an event. The dress arrived the next day and fit great! With the style u didn’t have to worry about it being wrinkly upon arrival. It fit well and was actually quite comfortable. Read more
items.author: Ckfamilyof4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress! And super comfy.
items.body: Super cute dress! We got an XS and it fit my daughter perfectly for her birthday photo shoot and birthday dinner outfit. Now she wants more colors. Read more
items.author: I bought this gift because I thought the price was nice, and reading the reviews it seemed like a decent wallet for my husband who has been wanting a slimmer wallet so his cards would quick breaking. I got this gift for him for Father’s Day, and upon opening there was no instructions which, whatever how hard could it be to figure it out right? Well the spring was broke it never popped up the cards that we stuck in no matter what way we flipped the cards. What a horrible gift to give on Father’s Day when it was broke and didn’t work. I don’t recommend, you pay for what you get. I’ll be purchasing the Grip6 wallet.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars stunning dress!
items.body: I wore it at my son's wedding and it was beyond 5 stars! I loved the fit and the color and the compliments were flying. I'm not sure how it would look and fit for someone not as small, as I am 5'2" and 98 lbs - but it's a gorgeous dress and I'll find some reason to wear it again. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars very cute but See through dress
items.body: Very cute dress. Only problem is that it is see through. Read more
items.author: Gabriella Gonzalez

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Orange Pink, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
